title: So my landlord insulted my mother and evicted us because we were looking for alternative cheaper rent.He basically spied on us.
selftext:
I can't even do anything, my mother said to forget about it but he said all kind of bad things.He is a loose character person but everyone is scared of him in the neighborhood.We got to know he has harrased many tenants before us.Can't even leave a google review because he reported my review and google marked my account as spam

Can anyone leave a review to warn future tenants

His name is Naru Gopal Ghosal and he is a gundaa so if u can leave a anonymous review it would be great.

https://www.google.com/search?q=nigamalay+apartment+1&oq=&aqs=chrome.0.35i39i362l2j35i39i362i650j35i39i362j35i39i362i650l3j35i39i362j35i39i362i650l7j0i3i66i143i308i362l5.-1j0j7&client=ms-android-xiaomi-rvo2&sourceid=chrome-mobile&ie=UTF-8#lpg=cid:CgIgAQ%3D%3D&trex=m_t:lcl_akp,rc_ludocids:1312854473224829083,rc_q:nigamalay%2520apartment%25201,ru_gwp:0%252C7,ru_q:nigamalay%2520apartment%25201,trex_id:Y7oiwf
comments:
This was my review if anyone's wandering

Owner Narugopal Ghosal is a complete fraud and loose character person. He gives his room on rent in 1st floor.The room doesn't have proper electric meter. You will not be able to use AC or washing machine.If you bring up these issues, he will harass you and the women of your house.He will harass you in order to increase rent. He has already forcefully evicted many
tenants. He claims to be a devotee of God but is actually a loose character and greedy piece of shit.I have never seen such an hypocrite asshole in my life.
Google marked your account spam? So you won't be able to use your Google account anymore?
This country has the collection of the worst human beings humanity has to offer.

Just wrote a 50 word article describing how bad he is and how he harasses his tenants. I already see many people leaving their reviews, and the rating has come down to 1 star ðŸŒŸ

Congratulations everybody

If you dont want to be marked as Spammer: 

Dont use Judgements/Labels (eg: complete fraud/loose character/greedy piece of shit etc) 

Just use sentences that describe Specific Details of what he did and stop. eg: Flat has no electric meter. Cant use AC/washing machine. Landlord has said he wont provide it. If he harassed a woman. Just say the woman did X this man did Y.
Even if I remove all those words, my review doesn't go through anymore
I can use google account but my reviews are not visible to anyone

Hey man thanks a lot, but do you know the funny thing? If you write a detailed review, google immediately removes it even if you are totally polite.....your review has been removed as well and is not visible to the public,just check from another google account.Same thing happened with me.

But thanks so much anyways for helping this brother out.
We were nothing but polite to him and in return my mother gets insulted and I did nothing

Guys thank you so much for helping me and any future tenant out there, after we left, he harrased a family of four and dragged the elderly father out of his house for failing to pay rent on first of month.The entire neighborhood was silent.He harrased another couple as well.This all happened in just 6 months.

Also some of your reviews are hidden from public by Google, same shit they did with me.
What is this? Are we all review bombing just because someone said something on the internet?

He insulted your mom just anonymous reports against him won't work, I mean we can't honestly do more than that but if there's a proof of what he says he can easily get behind the bars for abusing and threatening woman like that. Also you mentioned he spied on you, thats enough to understand his character. If he's a single goon I would rather go and get my hands on him.
Itâ€™s nothing to do with you friend. Some people are just shitty insects
